name: Paris

name: New York
description: The Big Apple, famous for its skyline, Broadway shows, and Central Park.

name: Tokyo
description: A bustling metropolis blending modern skyscrapers with traditional temples.

name: Sydney
description: Known for its Sydney Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and stunning beaches.

name: Rome
description: A historic city with ancient ruins, such as the Colosseum and the Roman Forum.

name: London
description: Home to landmarks like the British Museum, the Tower of London, and Buckingham Palace.

name: Dubai
description: Famous for its modern architecture, luxury shopping, and vibrant nightlife.

name: Cape Town
description: Known for its harbor, Table Mountain, and Cape Point.

name: Bali
description: A vibrant city known for its street life, cultural landmarks, and astonishing beach.
